actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the first $5,000 of income of individuals 65 years of age or over shall be excluded from gross income.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income of any individual who has attained the age of 65 the first $5,000 of income, including any amount received as a pension or annuity, which would otherwise be included in such gross income.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the first $5,000 of income of individuals 65 years of age or over shall be excluded from gross income.
